Admission-Process-Criteria_key4: School or college dropouts who want high-paying jobs
Admission-Process-Criteria_key6: Finished school and/or college but looking for financial stability
Admission-Process-Criteria_key7: Constrained by money or social situations but have high-growth career dreams
Admission-Process-Criteria_key10: Basic Maths test of 10th class level which can be given on smartphone/laptop
Admission-Process-Criteria_key11: 2 hours test of 36 marks with the passing cutoff of 13 marks for females & 15 for Male students.
Admission-Process-Criteria_key12: The test paper is in Hindi and English
Admission-Process-Criteria_key13: You can reappear for the test multiple times
Admission-Process-Criteria_key16: Telephonic interview of 30 minutes after you pass the online test
Admission-Process-Criteria_key17: The interviewer will call you in the scheduled time slot.
Admission-Process-Criteria_key18: The questions are more around introduction etc ( ‘Tell me about yourself, ‘Tell me about your hobby/best friend’, ‘Read a paragraph in English’ etc.)​
Admission-Process-Criteria_key19: Algebra Interview round - 1-hour Interview on WhatsApp video call after clearing the above 2 rounds. - Basic linear algebra concepts where you have to explain the method to solve the problem. - Click on this link to know more about the algebra concepts asked in the interview Link
Admission-Process-Criteria_key21: 30 min telephonic conversation on NG culture and social issues
Admission-Process-Criteria_key24: We will share the Offer Letter (Joining Letter), Forms/Undertaking to sign, Campus details, List of things to pack for the campus to you on your Email ID
Admission-Process-Criteria_key25: Make sure you bring the required documents signed while coming to campus
Admission-Process-Criteria_key26: Planning Logistics - We will talk to your parents (if required) and assist you in planning your visit​ To know more about the program, do visit our website: https://navgurukul.org/
Admission-Process-Criteria_key27: You can also call our team members: Nitesh: 8962158723
Admission-Process-Criteria_key28: Do watch these videos to know more about us & our program:
Admission-Process-Criteria_key29: How to crack Navgurukul Admission Test
